speaker: customer
dialogue: Those seagulls... \nstealing your food

speaker: customer
dialogue: They're so annoying. \nAlways have been.

speaker: customer
dialogue: Many years ago, \nattacked by seagulls I was.

speaker: customer
dialogue: Seagulls! \nStop it now!

speaker: cook
dialogue: Ehhh.. \nWho are you??!

speaker: customer
dialogue: You must be the owner of \nour last food stand on the beach

speaker: customer
dialogue: Don't worry, \nI'll help you to protect this stand.

speaker: cook
dialogue: Hang on, protect? Maybe \nI'm in the wrong place.

speaker: customer
dialogue: But I need energy to protect! \nCook me anything!

speaker: cook
dialogue: Really, I think I should \nset up shop somewhere else...

speaker: customer
dialogue: Drag some food to the plate\n and COOK!

speaker: cook
dialogue: Those seagulls pecked his brain too many times...

speaker: customer
dialogue: You made a new dish! \nYou can check it in your recipes.

speaker: customer
dialogue: Keep trying different combinations!

speaker: customer
dialogue: But first, \nthe food is getting cold!

speaker: customer
dialogue: Give it to me give it to me!

speaker: customer
dialogue: I'm happy with any food.

speaker: customer
dialogue: But some people \nmight have specific preferences.

speaker: customer
dialogue: If you don't have what they want \nbuy it before their next visit!

speaker: customer
dialogue: Different food also gives different buffs.

speaker: customer
dialogue: So choose carefully what to cook!

speaker: customer
dialogue: That food inspired me \nI'll start fighting those seagulls for you!

speaker: customer
dialogue: That's all. \nChase seagulls away \nor they will take your food.

speaker: customer
dialogue: See ya!
